title: Game Developers Session 2025
description: Game Developers Session is the oldest Central European conference dedicated to games development, game technologies, business and marketing.

title: Playtopia Festival 2025
description: It is a gathering of South African and global creators and players, where we celebrate the African “scene”. A place for people to come together to share ideas, connect across continents and disciplines, and to exhibit work.

title: Out of Index 2025
description: OOI is an experimental game festival. The main idea of the festival is to inspire the game industry with new ideas and experimental energy.

title: Boston FIG Festival 2025
description: Boston Festival of Indie games is back.
